channel.title: General Hosting Rackspace Movies Work News on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: oh yea.
item.description: i am pretty sure i was a bit tipsy when i wrote my last rant/entry. hah. but nobody knows. i can’t possibly imagine that it makes a whole bundle of sense. Last night i watched “Lost in translation” and a bit of “Endless Sunshine of a blah blah blah.” Tonight i am watching “Jesus’ Son.” Such great movies. I really love Jesus’ Son.Â I think it may be one of my favorite stories.
